description: Number of iterations until 3n reaches 153 under x goes to sum of cubes of digits map.
references: J. Roberts, Lure of the Integers, Math. Assoc. America, 1992, p. 13.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
